nodes.text: A library was a collection of information, resources and knowledge primarily in the form of books or holobooks, and generally maintained by a librarian. The Jedi Archives were an expansive library in the Jedi Temple on Coruscant maintained by Chief Librarian Jocasta Nu, containing a vast array of knowledge. The Great Jedi Library on Ossus was another large library maintained by the Jedi Order. The Ha Zurh Library and Records Office was a library in Tipoca City maintained by a droid librarian. The tree library was a hollowed-out uneti tree on Ahch-To that held the texts sacred to the Jedi Order.
